entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 6.
